verses.verse: And of the blue<WH8504>, and purple<WH713>, and scarlet<WH8144>, they made<WH6213> finely wrought<WH8278> garments<WH899>, for ministering<WH8334> in the holy<WH6944> place<WH6213>, and made the holy<WH6944> garments<WH899> for Aaron<WH175>; as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.
And he made<WH6213> the ephod<WH646> of gold<WH2091>, blue<WH8504>, and purple<WH713>, and scarlet<WH8438>, and fine twined<WH7806> linen<WH8336>.

And they did beat<WH7554> the gold<WH2091> into<WH854> thin plates<WH6341>, and cut<WH7112> it into wires<WH6616>, to work<WH6213> it in the blue<WH8504>, and in the purple<WH713>, and in the scarlet<WH8144>, and in the fine linen<WH8336>, the work<WH4639> of the skilful workman<WH2803>.
They made<WH6213> shoulder-pieces<WH3802> for it<WH2266>, joined together; at the two<WH8147> ends<WH7098> was it joined together<WH2266>.

And the skilfully woven band<WH2805>, that was upon it<WH642>, wherewith to gird it on<WH4639>, was of the same piece and like the work thereof<WH2091>; of gold, of blue<WH8504>, and purple<WH713>, and scarlet<WH8144>, and fine twined<WH7806> linen<WH8336>; as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.

And they wrought<WH6213> the onyx<WH7718> stones<WH68>, inclosed<WH4142> in settings<WH4865> of gold<WH2091>, graven<WH6605> with the engravings<WH6605> of a signet<WH2368>, according to the names<WH8034> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

And he put<WH7760> them on the shoulder-pieces<WH3802> of the ephod<WH646>, to be stones<WH68> of memorial<WH2146> for the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.

And he made<WH6213> the breastplate<WH2833>, the work<WH4639> of the skilful<WH2803> workman<WH4639>, like the work of the ephod<WH646>; of gold<WH2091>, of blue<WH8504>, and purple<WH713>, and scarlet<WH8144>, and fine twined<WH7806> linen<WH8336>.

It was foursquare<WH7251>; they made<WH6213> the breastplate<WH2833> double<WH3717>: a span<WH2239> was the length<WH753> thereof<WH2239>, and a span the breadth<WH7341> thereof<WH3717>, being double.
And they set<WH4390> in it four<WH702> rows<WH2905> of stones<WH68>. A row<WH2905> of sardius<WH124>, topaz<WH6357>, and carbuncle<WH1304> was the first<WH259> row<WH2905>;
and the second<WH8145> row<WH2905>, an emerald<WH5306>, a sapphire<WH5601>, and a diamond<WH3095>;
and the third<WH7992> row<WH2905>, a jacinth<WH3958>, an agate<WH7618>, and an amethyst<WH306>;
and the fourth<WH7243> row<WH2905>, a beryl<WH8658>, an onyx<WH7718>, and a jaspar<WH3471>: they were inclosed<WH4142> in inclosings<WH4396> of gold<WH2091> in their settings<WH4865>.

And the stones<WH68> were according to the names<WH8034> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, twelve<WH8147>, according to their names<WH8034>; like the engravings<WH6603> of a signet<WH2368>, every one<WH376> according to his name<WH8034>, for the twelve<WH8147> tribes<WH7626>.
And they made<WH6213> upon the breastplate<WH2833> chains<WH8333> like cords<WH1383>, of wreathen<WH5688> work<WH4639> of pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091>.

And they made<WH6213> two<WH8147> settings<WH4865> of gold<WH2091>, and two<WH8147> gold<WH2091> rings<WH2885>, and put<WH5414> the two<WH8147> rings<WH2885> on the two<WH8147> ends<WH7098> of the breastplate<WH2833>.
And they put<WH5414> the two<WH8147> wreathen chains<WH5688> of gold<WH2091> in the two<WH8147> rings<WH2885> at the ends<WH7098> of the breastplate<WH2833>.

And the other two<WH8147> ends<WH7098> of the two<WH8147> wreathen<WH5688> chains<WH5688> they put<WH5414> on the two<WH8147> settings<WH4865>, and put<WH5414> them on the shoulder-pieces<WH3802> of the ephod<WH646>, in the<WH4136> forepart thereof<WH6440>.

And they made<WH6213> two<WH8147> rings<WH2885> of gold<WH2091>, and put<WH7760> them upon the two<WH8147> ends<WH7098> of the breastplate<WH2833>, upon the edge<WH8193> thereof<WH5676>, which was toward the side of the ephod<WH646> inward<WH1004>.

And they made<WH6213> two<WH8147> rings<WH2885> of gold<WH2091>, and put<WH5414> them on the two<WH8147> shoulder-pieces<WH3802> of the ephod<WH646> underneath<WH4295>, in<WH4136> the forepart<WH6440> thereof<WH5980>, close by the coupling<WH4225> thereof<WH4605>, above the skilfully woven band<WH2805> of the ephod<WH646>.

And they did bind<WH7405> the breastplate<WH2833> by the rings<WH2885> thereof unto the rings<WH2885> of the ephod<WH646> with a lace<WH6616> of blue<WH8504>, that it might be upon the skilfully woven band<WH2805> of the ephod<WH646>, and that the breastplate<WH2833> might not be loosed<WH2118> from the ephod<WH646>; as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.
And he made<WH6213> the robe<WH4598> of the ephod<WH646> of woven<WH707> work<WH4639>, all<WH3632> of blue<WH8504>;

and the hole<WH6310> of the robe<WH4598> in the midst<WH8432> thereof<WH6310>, as the hole of a coat<WH8473> of mail<WH8193>, with a binding round about<WH5439> the hole<WH6310> of it<WH7167>, that it should not be rent.
And they made<WH6213> upon the skirts<WH7757> of the robe<WH4598> pomegranates<WH7416> of blue<WH8504>, and purple<WH713>, and scarlet<WH8144>, and twined linen<WH7806>.

And they made<WH6213> bells<WH6472> of pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091>, and put<WH5414> the bells<WH6472> between<WH8432> the pomegranates<WH7416> upon the skirts<WH7757> of the robe<WH4598> round about<WH5439>, between<WH8432> the pomegranates<WH7416>;

a bell<WH6472> and a pomegranate<WH7416>, a bell<WH6472> and a pomegranate<WH7416>, upon the skirts<WH7757> of the robe<WH4598> round about<WH5439>, to minister<WH8334> in<WH3068>; as Jehovah commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.
And they made<WH6213> the coats<WH3801> of fine linen<WH8336> of woven<WH707> work<WH4639> for Aaron<WH175>, and for his sons<WH1121>,
and the mitre<WH4701> of fine linen<WH8336>, and the goodly<WH6287> head-tires<WH4021> of fine linen<WH8336>, and the linen<WH8336> breeches<WH4370> of fine twined<WH7806> linen<WH8336>,

and the girdle<WH73> of fine twined<WH7806> linen<WH8336>, and blue<WH8504>, and purple<WH713>, and scarlet<WH8144>, the work of the embroiderer<WH7551>; as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.

And they made<WH6213> the plate<WH6731> of the holy<WH6944> crown<WH5145> of pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091>, and wrote<WH3789> upon it a writing<WH4385>, like the engravings<WH6603> of a signet<WH2368>, HOLY<WH6944> TO JEHOVAH<WH3068>.
And they tied<WH5414> unto it a lace<WH6616> of blue<WH8504>, to fasten<WH5414> it upon the mitre<WH4701> above<WH4605>; as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.

Thus was finished<WH3615> all the work<WH5656> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the tent<WH4908> of meeting<WH4150>: and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> according to all that Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>; so did they<WH6213>.

And they brought<WH935> the tabernacle<WH4908> unto Moses<WH4872>, the Tent<WH168>, and all its furniture<WH3627>, its clasps<WH7165>, its boards<WH7175>, it bars<WH1280>, and its pillars<WH5982>, and it sockets<WH134>;
and the covering<WH4372> of rams<WH352>' skins<WH5785> dyed red<WH119>, and the covering<WH4372> of<WH8476> sealskins<WH5785>, and the veil<WH6532> of the screen<WH4539>;
the ark<WH727> of the testimony<WH5715>, and the staves<WH905> thereof<WH3727>, and the mercy-seat;
the table<WH7979>, all the vessels<WH3627> thereof<WH6440>, and the showbread;
the pure<WH2889> candlestick<WH4501>, the lamps<WH5216> thereof<WH5216>, even the lamps to be set in order<WH4634>, and all the vessels<WH3627> thereof<WH8081>, and the oil for the light<WH3974>;
and the golden<WH2091> altar<WH4196>, and the anointing<WH4888> oil<WH8081>, and the sweet<WH5561> incense<WH7004>, and the screen<WH4539> for the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168>;
the brazen<WH5178> altar<WH4196>, and its grating<WH4345> of brass<WH5178>, its staves<WH905>, and all its vessels<WH3627>, the laver<WH3595> and its base<WH3653>;

the hangings<WH7050> of the court<WH2691>, its pillars<WH5982>, and its sockets<WH134>, and the screen<WH4539> for the gate<WH8179> of the court<WH2691>, the cords<WH4340> thereof<WH3489>, and the pins thereof<WH3627>, and all the instruments of the service<WH5656> of the tabernacle<WH4908>, for the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>;

the finely wrought<WH8278> garments<WH899> for ministering<WH8334> in the holy<WH6944> place<WH6944>, and the holy garments<WH899> for Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548>, and the garments<WH899> of his sons<WH1121>, to minister in the priest<WH3547>'s office.
According to all that Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>, so the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> all the work<WH5656>.

And Moses<WH4872> saw<WH7200> all<WH3651> the work<WH4399>, and<WH6213>, behold, they had done it<WH3068>; as Jehovah had commanded<WH6680>, even so had they done<WH6213> it<WH4872>: and Moses blessed them<WH1288>.
